participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, often focused on career growth despite challenges.
participant_1.background: i currently work for a watch dealer. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. my family doesn't support my career choices.

participant_2.name: Amina Hassan
participant_2.personality: Creative and lively, with a passion for dance and a strong sense of resilience.
participant_2.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. i like to dance. my aunt helped me escape when i was of.
